conbody.p: This function is available to users with administrator privileges only.
Clicking "Open User Manager" opens the user Managment. The window is divided into two tabs:

ul.li: The tab Manage Users and User Groups offers the opportunity to create new accounts for users and add users to project groups, which have a specific set of rights in the editing process.

The tab Administrate User Roles and Rights allows the administrator to assign user roles to selected corpora and to assign users to the respective roles (i.e. Project -> Corpus -> User Role -> User Name).
